Articles.Content:
Hoping squad can give a little insight as to why the new rover command module (from pc version 1.4 i think) was not included in the new parts pack. 

Don't get me wrong I'm not complaining. I'm loving the new update so far, and i think you guys done a great job with the new parts. 

But if I'm being honest I was really sad when I seen that this was not included.  

Atm it's a bit of a pain trying to decide what module to use for rovers. This new part looks great, and will give ability for some really cool rover designs.

So yeah any news or a straight no we can't add that piece to console for x reason. Would be greatly appreciated.

@mikey117 The console update included all of the part revamps up to PC version 1.5. The rover command module is a variant of the revamped Mk2 Lander Can, which was included in 1.6. You'll probably get it in your next major update.

1 hour ago, RealKerbal3x said:

@mikey117 The console update included all of the part revamps up to PC version 1.5. The rover command module is a variant of the revamped Mk2 Lander Can, which was included in 1.6. You'll probably get it in your next major update.

cool

Oh ok I thought it was from 1.4. Here's hoping, tbh they have done a great job with enhanced edition imo. 

Now I personally think all we need now is the delta v calculator and some bigger landing legs. Fingers crossed for a another update within a year.
